Welcome to Peak Risk Solutions Ltd.

We are an independent Risk Management company providing specialist expertise to our global partners and customers, helping them reduce their exposure to Casualty Insurance claims and their associated costs.

Specialising in Products Liability risk control, we are also risk management experts in Employers’ Liability/Workers’ Compensation, Public Liability and Contractors Liability lines.

Why chose us?

  • Flexible, scalable service
    So you only pay for the service you want.
  • Hourly rates with no minimum fee
    So you control your costs from the outset.
  • Ad Hoc commissions through to full Risk Managed Programmes
    Expertise on tap, as little or often as you want it.
  • Remote Support delivery
    Saves you money by eliminating unnecessary expenses and overheads.
  • Feedback style
    You dictate what format you want and so control its cost.
  • Global reach, 24/7
    Smarter us of technology wherever you or your clients are based.

Contact us to find out how we’ll enhance your existing Casualty Risk Management arrangements.
